content: i wanted an alternate horn to use on the viking helmet by safiya ali and the inner beast by sharon maher but couldn t find a pattern for the shape i had in mind so i made my own these are made using a 5mm h hook and any worsted weight yarn they do not use a lot of yarn each finished horn is about 5 5 long and should curve and twist slightly like a stretched out spring it is worked in the round with basic stitches single_crochet increase and decrease
